text: West Caldwell High School (WCHS) is an American public high school in Lenoir, North Carolina. The school has an approximate enrollment of 825 students in grades 9-12. ==Notable alumni== * North Carolina State Representative Destin Hall * Voice actor Jason Hatfield ==References== ==External links== *School website Category:Public high schools in North Carolina Category:Schools in Caldwell County, North Carolina
title: West Caldwell High School
